nodes.text: The Jurzan spaceport was a spaceport where the bounty hunter Bossk's favorite cantina was located. By 3 ABY, Bossk and the smugglers Han Solo and Chewbacca had engaged in an explosive firefight on the spaceport which resulted in the destruction of the cantina and the Bitemark, a new starship the Trandoshan had just purchased. Bossk was almost successful in capturing the duo to claim the bounty on their heads, but ultimately they escaped.

The Jurzan spaceport was mentioned in "Tooth and Claw", a short story written by Michael Kogge and published in the From a Certain Point of View: The Empire Strikes Back anthology in 2020. In the Star Wars Legends continuity, a planet named Jurzan was introduced in the article "The Business of Bacta", which was also written by Kogge and published in Star Wars Adventure Journal 3 in 1994.
